resources.string:
wiRent is a Ugandan-based company which offers a digital plartform for listing Rentals,Hostels and Tourist B and B residential spaces directly by property owners.
 
 Our Vision:
 
 To become the leading real estate company in Africa providing world Class Real Estate Services


Our Goal:


To unite the Real Estate Brokers, and their Associates of The Bahamas for the purpose of exerting effectively a combined positive influence upon matters affecting their profession.

At wirenti.com, accessible from http://wirenti.com/, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by wirenti.com and how we use it.
 If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
 This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in wirenti.com. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the "https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/privacy-policy-generator/"Free Privacy Policy Generator.
